description:
Welcome to the 1st dreams list course on Udemy!

Have you ever felt like you don't have control of your life? Me too. That is why I created this course! To help you with what I needed help with. Now, a dreams list can't give you instant control on your life, but it can help you focus on what you really want!

This course is great for whether you want to focus down on your own life, or give the gift of focus to your employees. You will be amazed at the increased productivity when you can teach an employee how to create their own dreams list!

This course will take you approximately 1-2 hours to complete, and then I suggest going back to your dreams list often to keep it current!

I made this to be a step-by-step course. You can follow along and get ideas for your dreams list!

Have fun! :)
title: Become a dreams list expert
